metadata.description: Dynamite presents... The ultimate Red Sonja. The opening issue of this new, ongoing series finds Sonja on an epic quest; a quest to rid the world of an ancient evil. And a quest that places her in battle between the Zeddas and the Kingdom of Gathia. The legend of Red Sonja begins here! This story re-introduces Red Sonja to the world of comics, and is a classic in the making!
metadata.name: Red Sonja: She-Devil With a Sword
